import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { List ,HouseDoor, ListUl, Basket3, CloudPlus, BoxArrowRight } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import './Sidebar.css'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function Sidebar({children}){ return(
Recent Orders
Order Details
Menu List
Add Menu
Logout
{children}
) } export default Sidebar;
